actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rules of the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rules of the House

official_title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to grant floor and speaking privileges to former Presidents of the United States (other than a former President who resigned from office).

summary.text: Amends rule XXXII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to give floor privileges to former U.S. Presidents (other than a President who resigned from office). Prohibits such privilege if the individual: (1) has any direct, personal, or pecuniary interest in any pending or reported legislation in the House; and (2) is employed or represents any party or organization for the purpose of influencing the passage or defeat of such legislation. Authorizes former U.S. Presidents (other than one who resigned from office) to address the House under the same terms and conditions as Members.

titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to grant floor and speaking privileges to former Presidents of the United States (other than a former President who resigned from office).
